snippet: The stock sale priced OnDeck’s shares at $20 each, surpassing a forecasted range of $16 to $18, and reflected Wall Street investors’ continued embrace of the alternative lending industry.
abstract: The stock sale priced OnDeck’s shares at $20 each, surpassing a forecasted range of $16 to $18, and reflected Wall Street investors’ continued embrace of the alternative lending industry.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: OnDeck, a Lender to Small Businesses, Raises $200 Million in I.P.O.
